speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Claire from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I'm busy!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you're busy, but I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance. Can you please verify your date of birth so we can proceed?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f*** do you need that? Just tell me what I owe!

speaker: Agent
text: I can certainly help you with that, but I need to confirm your identity first. Can you please provide your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Fine! It's January 15, 1990. Now can we get on with it?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming. You currently have a balance of $750. How would you like to handle that today?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m not paying a dime! You can shove that balance up your ass!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand you may feel frustrated, but it’s important we discuss your options. Can I explain a payment plan that might work for you?

speaker: Customer
text: Payment plan? Are you kidding me? Just f*** off already!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate your feedback. My goal is to assist you. If we can come to an agreement, it would help resolve this matter.

speaker: Customer
text: You think I care? Just get lost!

speaker: Agent
text: I hear you. If you change your mind, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time today.
